modName: Horse Whistle Sound Replacer - Ezios Whistle
summary: A simple sound replacer for DarkenDe\'s Horse Whistle mod....
descriptionHtml:
Ezio\'s Horse whistle sound V 1.0
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A simple sound replacer for DarkenDe\'s Horse Whistle mod. I was inspired by Ezio\'s whistle from Assassin\'s Creed Brotherhood. I felt that both DarkenDe\'s and Psychosteve\'s horse whistle was too much like calling a dog over. I found this whistle and love it, so i imported it for myself, but thought I should share to this great community. It\'s short/fast, loud/clear, and right to the punch.


Install
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


> Extract manually \"whistle.wav\" into your \"data/sound/fx\" folder

OR

> Use Nexus Mod Manager


Uninstall
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


>Simply delete \"whistle.wav\" placed in \"data/sound/fx\"

OR

> Use Nexus Mod Manager


Credits
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Thanks to DarkenDe for the original mod

>> mod : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5528
author: Knigh7 Krawl3r
